name: completion
shortDescription: Set up Angular CLI autocompletion for your terminal.
longDescription:
To enable Bash and Zsh real-time type-ahead autocompletion, run
`ng completion` and restart your terminal.

Alternatively, append `source <(ng completion script)` to the appropriate `.bashrc`,
`.bash_profile`, `.zshrc`, `.zsh_profile`, or `.profile` file.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

subcommands.name: script
subcommands.shortDescription: Generate a bash and zsh real-time type-ahead autocompletion script.
